userfiltertypes.userattribute: User Attribute:Comma seperated list of attributes to check for
userfiltertypes.mos: MOS: Comma separated list of MOSs
userfiltertypes.storedprocedure: Stored Procedure: Condition is TR_LOCAL_PROCEDURE ID, sends in customer_no
userfiltertypes.membershiplevel: Membership Level: Comma separated list of levels
userfiltertypes.promocode: Promo Code: Comma separate list of promo code IDs
userfiltertypes.shippingmethod: Shipping Method: The current shipping method, use comma separated values
userfiltertypes.cartcontainsseason: Cart Contains Season: Comma separated seasons in cart
userfiltertypes.cartcontainsperformance: Cart Contains Performance: Comma separated performances in cart
userfiltertypes.cartcontainsfacility: Cart Contains Facility: Comma separated facility no in cart
userfiltertypes.cartcontainsfund: Cart Contains Fund Id: Comma separated fund no in cart
userfiltertypes.cartcontainsdonationamount: Cart Contains Contribution Amount: Comma separated contribution amount in cart
userfiltertypes.cartcontainsproduction: Cart Contains Production: Comma separated productions in cart
userfiltertypes.cartcontainspackage: Cart Contains Package: Comma separated packages in cart
userfiltertypes.storedprocedurecached: Stored Procedure: Condition is TR_LOCAL_PROCEDURE ID, sends in no parameters and is cached for 1 minute

tessituravisitor.persistcookiename: Persist across sesssions as cookie name (unique and optional)
tessituravisitor.savesuccessinsession: If successful save in the current session (speed benefit)
